name: Skeleton
description: Skeletonizer helpers with theme-aware config and extensions.

use: you want skeleton loading states tied to the shadcn theme.
you need helper extensions for common skeleton patterns.

examples.minimal:
ShadcnSkeletonizerConfigLayer(
  theme: Theme.of(context),
  child: ListView.builder(
    itemCount: 5,
    itemBuilder: (_, __) => const Text('Loading...'),
  ),
)

accessibility: Use skeletons sparingly and replace with real content quickly.
do: Keep skeleton shapes similar to final content layout.
dont: Leave skeletons running without loading feedback.
